apps.localizedDescription:
Credits: KEEP THE CREDITS IF YOU WANT TO RE-UP MY IPA! 
- Alfhaily for Cercube.
- Galactic-Dev for the original iSponsorBlock, @Luewii for his fork of iSponsorBlock (which works in jailed mode).
- PoomSmart for YTUHD, YTClassicVideoQuality, YTSystemAppearence, YouAreThere and YouPiP.
- level3tjg for YTNoHoverCards.
- Al4ise for Azule - a tool used to make this IPA! 
- u/el_zari, the best tester I ever worked with. Plus many, many other testers. 

Features:
- Cercube no ads: make sure you log in to Cercube using a verified account.
- SponsorBlock: skip sponsor ads inside videos.
- YTUHD: unlock VP9 codec, which also enables 1440 & 2140p quality.
- YTClassicVideoQuality: brings back the original video quality selector.
- YouAreThere: Disable popup that shows up when you play a long video. 
- YouPiP: Enable native PiP in YouTube app. 
- YTNoHoverCards: allows creator End screens (thumbnails) to appear at the end of videos. 
- YTNoShorts: remove Shorts in Home tab. You still can watch Shorts in the Shorts tab, or search for shorts in the search bar. 

Known issues:
- Cercube logo & YouTube logo may not appear in the top bar. 
- YouPiP: due to Apple's fault, speed-up bug still happens sometimes. (Workaround: use Legacy PiP, not recommend unless you're facing the speed-up bug). 
- iSponsorBlock: segments color doesn't show up in the seek bar. Workaround: downgrade to v16.20.5.
- YTUHD may not work for some reasons. 
- Does not work on iOS 12 and below.
apps.name: BetterCercube
apps.subtitle: Ad-free Cercube for YouTube
apps.versionDescription:
- Initial release

 For full changelog, visit https://appdb.to/app/cydia/1900000823

apps.localizedDescription:
uYou+ comes with original features we all like and love while injecting additional tweaks for extra functionality.

List of injected tweaks:
uYou v1.1
YTStockShare v1.3
YouAreThere v1.0.1
YouPiP v1.5.7
YTClassicVideoQualitySelector v1.0.1
YTSystemAppearance v1.0.0
YTUHD v1.2.0
YTNoHoverCards v0.0.3
